::KitKat::

She looked up at him. He was nearly twice her size. She watched as he 
sat down. She walked in and sat down at the table. She smiled 
slightly. "Your from Cybertron? How is the old mother planet doing?"
She put her hands infront of her on the table. "This planet is Earth. 
What you really landed on was a war between the groups. We are 
currently raging against another predacon group called the Allience. 
You said that your ready to kill? I will have use of you and your 
team."  She smiled a slightly evil smile. "Great use of you and your 
t4eam. But Please, tell me more about yourself."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest::
> 
> The door to killfest's room opens, the huge terrorist leader 
looking 
> down at KitKat. This was their leader? A femm that was roughly half 
> Killfest's size?
> 
> "My name's Killfest," he replies, looking at her with a neutral 
> expression, "I just landed here due to an exile from Cybertron. My 
> team is ready to kill, but we don't know much about this planet."
> 
> He walks back toward a table in his room, motioning for KitKat to 
sit 
> down.
>
